title: How Many Calories in Prosecco?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in prosecco per standard glass, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition breakdown for brut and sweeter varieties.
assumptions: Brut prosecco (11% ABV, low residual sugar), standard 150 ml serving, no mixers added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, sweetness level (brut, extra dry, etc.), ABV, and serving size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 150 ml glass of brut prosecco contains about 105 kcal, primarily from alcohol with minimal carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with beverage nutrition.

tweaks.label: Mixed with soda water (spritzer, half prosecco)

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of prosecco?
faqs.a: About 105 kcal for a 150 ml glass of brut prosecco.
Yes, around 2.7 g carbs per 150 ml glass, mostly sugars.

faqs.q: How do calories in prosecco compare to other wines?
faqs.a: Similar to dry white wines at ~70-80 kcal per 100 ml; sweeter varieties add 20-30 kcal.

faqs.q: Is prosecco lower calorie than champagne?
faqs.a: Brut prosecco is comparable or slightly lower than brut champagne, both ~70 kcal/100 ml.
ABV, residual sugar (brut vs. demi-sec), and serving size; opt for brut for fewer calories.
